value.title: Variables in power query | How and practical use case

value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going to write a function that calculates work hour (seconds) between two datetimes. Working hour by location, holidays will also be included :)  Link to Bills thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/f3fc729e-a2ec-409a-b20e-b5cf8ff5dc2a/calculate-work-hours-between-two-timedate-stamps?forum=powerquery

value.title: Write if statements like a Pro in Power Query
value.excerpt: As the title says, in this video I will show you how to write if-statements like a pro: 00:00 The ultimate if-statement 00:40 if statement in Excel wont work 01:50 Use power query user interface to write if statement 03:00 Nested if-statements 03:38 AND/OR conditions in if statements 04:48 NOT condition

value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can easily add the sequence for the rows using the PowerQuery. In Power Query we can add the sequence number using the Index. Let’s see how to add the Index column in the Power BI.  If you really like this video don’t forget to subscribe to my channel. ***************

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Getting Crazy with the Power Query UI

value.title: Is Data Wrangler the Power Query of Python?

value.title: Create Row Number for Each Group in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create a row-number statically as a pre-calculation in Power BI, then Power Query has a very simple way of doing it; Add Index Column. However, the Index column creates the row number regardless of any grouping or categorization. sometimes you want to take that into account too. There

value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, I’ll show you a way to catch potential errors

value.title: How to Create a Date or Calendar Table and Dimension in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Date dimension or calendar table is one of the most important dimensions in any BI system. In this video, I'm showing you how easy is to create a date dimension using Power Query. The script of this video can be found in my blog article here:  https://radacad.com/create-a-date-dimension-in-power-bi-in-4-steps-step-1-calendar-columns

value.title: Know Your Data Better by Column Profiling In Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: An essential step towards a better analytics solution is to know your data. You have to know your data to be able to determine key columns, to learn what transformations need to be done, and etc. Power Query provides a very useful way of knowing your data in Power BI. value.title: Unpivot in Power BI and Power Query Transforming Budget Data from Columns to Rows
value.excerpt: Turning columns to rows or rows to columns is easy with Power Query and Power BI. On the other hand, many times you get multiple columns and want to change it to name, value

value.title: When to use Power Query/M vs Data Modelling/DAX
